feed.title: Caila Finn
feed.subtitle: A software engineer and motorbike fanatic. Sometimes she writes about bikes she's ridden and stuff she's working on for fun.

entry.title: First Post
entry.content:
Suppose I should write something in here. Thought it might be a good place to keep track of my various hobbies and interests.

Hopefully I’ll be able to keep this up for a while, particularly for keeping track of my motorbike stuff. Since it’s something I currently have no experience in it might be nice to come back to this later and see how my skills have developed.

Let’s wait and see.
entry.summary: Suppose I should write something in here. Thought it might be a good place to keep track of my various hobbies and interests.
